TextView.android:text: What is the start date of your last menstrual period (LMP)? (Day/Month/Year)
What is the start date of your last menstrual period (LMP)?
How is the start date of last menstrual period obtained?
Which of the following criteria confirmed the pregnancy?
Last menstrual period 6 weeks ago or Longer
Pregnant woman has felt fetal movement
Physical examination by Doctor or health care provider
Auscultation of fetal heart sound by Doctor or health care provider
Positive pregnancy test at a facility
Positive pregnancy test (urine) by HDSS staff
Have you ever done a prenatal consultation (ANC)?
6. What are the prenatal consultations(ANC) in which you participated( follow-up ANC calendar)?
ANC AT THE FIRST MONTH OF PREGNANCY
ANC AT THE SECOND MONTH OF PREGNANCY
ANC AT THE THIRD MONTH OF PREGNANCY
ANC AT THE FOURTH MONTH OF PREGNANCY
ANC AT THE FIFTH MONTH OF PREGNANCY
ANC AT THE SIXTH MONTH OF PREGNANCY
ANC AT THE SEVENTH MONTH OF PREGNANCY
ANC AT THE EIGTH MONTH OF PREGNANCY
ANC AT THE NINTH MONTH OF PREGNANCY
Was this pregnancy enrolled in the Pregnancy Surveillance (PS) Study?
Would you wish to enroll in the PS study?
